title: Veranda post
description: painted and carved wood house post; a woman holding a three tier set of baskets on her head kneels on the head of a man riding a horse and carrying a large knife in his proper left hand; 3 mounts accompanying object 1 from dealer, 1 MIA, and 1 from the Smithsonian; wooden mount L4.3 MS
creditline: Lent by Curtis Galleries, Inc., Minneapolis, MN
